system.description:
Specializations: Particular ship type or class — raft, sailboat, frigate.

This skill represents a character’s familiarity with the workings of aquatic vehicles, and his ability to repair and modify them. Each roll may repair one damaged system aboard a particular vessel. The cost and difficulty to repair a vessel depends on how badly it is damaged, and what systems have been hit. See “Using Repair Skills” above for difficulties and costs associated with various systems which may be damaged.
system.time_taken: In general, 15 minutes, then one hour, then one day, then two days. May be customized to circumstances.
system.label: OD6S.CHAR_SKILLS
